<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_one_extend_definition_config</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sys_one_extend_definition_config">definitionVALCHANGES^capabilityVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="definition" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="capability" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Abort duplicate definition configs</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
if (current.definition && current.capability) {
var definitionConfigGr = new GlideRecord('sys_one_extend_definition_config'); definitionConfigGr.addQuery('definition', current.definition); definitionConfigGr.addQuery('capability', current.capability); definitionConfigGr.query();
// If a record with the same definition + capability combination already exists, abort the insert if (definitionConfigGr.hasNext()) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Duplicate inserts are not allowed.")); current.setAbortAction(true); } }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-11-01 08:26:59</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>13b6cb2077dab5106e2ff2e81e5a99f9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Abort duplicate definition configs</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Glide OneExtend" source="com.glide.one_extend">dc98175b47220210cd4e1ce4316d4324</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_13b6cb2077dab5106e2ff2e81e5a99f9</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-11-02 05:26:59</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=13b6cb2077dab5106e2ff2e81e5a99f9"/> </record_update>
